Nuage des mots

el_wordcloud.Rd

Nuage des mots

Usage

el_wordcloud(
  table_keywords,
  keywords_to_remove,
  max_size = 10,
  low_color = "#442484",
  high_color = "#04a3bb"
)

Arguments

table_keywords

table_keywords, obtenues via el_table_keywords()

keywords_to_remove

a vector of keywords to remove from the cloud

max_size

the maximum size of a word

low_color

the color of most frequent word (defaults to "#442484")

high_color

the color of least frequent word (defaults to "#04a3bb")

Value

Un data.frame avec les mots-clés, leur type, leur fréquence

Examples

metadata_keywords %>%
dplyr::filter(type=="FREE")
#> Error: object 'metadata_keywords' not found
el_wordcloud(metadata_keywords_FREE,keywords_to_remove=c("OHM VR","Rhône"))
#> Error: object 'metadata_keywords_FREE' not found
